# Icon Files

This folder should contain the extension icons in PNG format:

- **icon16.png** - 16x16 pixels (toolbar icon)
- **icon48.png** - 48x48 pixels (extension management)
- **icon128.png** - 128x128 pixels (Chrome Web Store)

## Creating Icons

You can create icons using:
- Design tools like Figma, Sketch, or Canva
- Online icon generators
- AI image generators
- Photo editing software (Photoshop, GIMP)

## Design Suggestions

For an ATS Resume Tracker, consider icons featuring:
- Document/resume symbol
- Checkmark or approval symbol
- Chart/graph for analytics
- Magnifying glass for analysis
- Color scheme: Professional blues and purples (matching the extension theme)

## Quick Icon Creation

If you need placeholder icons quickly:
1. Use [favicon.io](https://favicon.io/) to generate icons
2. Use [flaticon.com](https://www.flaticon.com/) for free icon resources
3. Use an emoji-to-icon converter for quick placeholders

## Current Status

⚠️ **Icons need to be added** - The extension will work without custom icons but will show default Chrome placeholders.
